Make sure to hit the FOLLOW button to be notified of new updates!","genre":""},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":4140485,"totalDownVotes":346386,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":102623,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

INNOCENTS: Run and hide from the Murderer. Use your detective skills to expose the Murderer.
SHERIFF: Work with the Innocents; you are the only one with a weapon who can take down the Murderer. 
MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 
 
Twitter: @NikilisRBX
YouTube: Nikilis 

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 

Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!","genre":""},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":826758,"totalDownVotes":59329,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[UPDATE 14] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":91452,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔵🔴 UPDATE 14 OUT NOW! 🔴🔵
Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans.","genre":""},{"creatorId":5449496,"creatorName":"Lyte Interactive","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":834598,"totalDownVotes":77284,"universeId":2404080894,"name":"{EMOTES} Funky Friday","placeId":6447798030,"playerCount":62561,"imageToken":"T_6447798030_4d91","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"beat box battle

Arrivederci!","genre":""},{"creatorId":4294803,"creatorName":"Fireheart Studio","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":143228,"totalDownVotes":19642,"universeId":1650291138,"name":"Demonfall [UPDATE 1.3] ","placeId":4855457388,"playerCount":29048,"imageToken":"T_4855457388_e0ab","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"[IMPORTANT] Demonfall is currently in Beta, Frequent shutdowns and bugs should be expected after an update.

[WARNING]
Mobile still in beta, bugs can happens

>> This game is incredibly difficult with little to no hand holding. Enter at your own risk.

>> More Info Check GameInfo In Community Dis

Demonfall is based on the popular series Demon Slayer.

Ascend the hill with the power of humanity on your shoulder, and fight for survival along with your comrades; or head down the ravine to lose ones humanity, and live as a demon with unholy powers.
Fight, explore, learn, grow, eat, all common necessities and virtues of one, despite your path, in this world, its the survival of the fittest.

Level cap: 50

[Controls]
R - Unsheathe Sword
Tab - Menu Toggle Tab --> Configuration = Reset
M - Meditate [Skill Tree]
H - Toggle Emotes
Sprint + M1 - Lunge
Block + M1 - Shoulder Bash
C - Rush
G - Breathe
Q - Dash
F - Block","genre":""},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2216516,"totalDownVotes":302031,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🏰High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":44578,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌊 Summer Wave 1: Welcome to Summer World, Diamond Beach! (LIVE)✅
🌊Surprise Monstercat Event! (LIVE)✅
🌊 Wave 2: Quests ☐
🌊 Wave 3: Fair Pier ☐

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡","genre":""},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":157289,"totalDownVotes":47535,"universeId":2619619496,"name":"BedWars 🎶 [MELODY KIT + FREE  ARCHER!]","placeId":6872265039,"playerCount":41031,"imageToken":"T_6872265039_aa21","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to the BedWars beta release!

We will be updating the game daily during Beta. Report any issues on twitter and the community server!

Controls:
[Shift]: Sprint
[E]: Open inventory
[Q]: Drop item
[Ctrl]: Lock camera

How to play BedWars:
📡 Join the "BedWars" queue in the Lobby to find a match
🛌 Protect your bed. Once it's gone, you can no longer respawn!
💎 Gather resources to purchase items and team upgrades
🏹 Destroy enemy beds and eliminate players to win the match!

If you've played SkyWars before, you'll pickup BedWars in no time!","genre":""},{"creatorId":63700903,"creatorName":"Coeptus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3441475,"totalDownVotes":319722,"universeId":88070565,"name":"Welcome to Bloxburg","placeId":185655149,"playerCount":45970,"imageToken":"T_185655149_9e67","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":25,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build and design your own amazing house, own cool vehicles, hang out with friends, work, roleplay or explore the city of Bloxburg. Update Log: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/--/361910","genre":""},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":3092054,"totalDownVotes":400165,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":23674,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"The summer update is now out!
